name: Max Mix (Jam Version)
description:
Learn about different occupations in this simple dress up game for young kids.

This is demo game. Support development by donating. Every bit helps.

We also love hearing from you, every bit of creative feedback will be highly appreciated.

The full version will include:

  • A female character
  • More outfits for both characters.
  • Win states, with audio, for matching outfits.
